title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Commerce Stream
description: Complete your A/L in the Commerce stream with good results in Accounting, Business Studies, and Economics. This provides the foundational knowledge for higher studies.

title: Professional Qualification Foundation
description: Start a professional accounting qualification alongside or after your A/Ls. The most recognized bodies in Sri Lanka are CA Sri Lanka, CIMA, and ACCA. Begin with their foundational levels.

title: Bachelor's Degree & Intermediate Professional Stages
description: While continuing your professional qualification, consider pursuing a BSc in Accounting, Finance, or Business Administration. Many degrees offer exemptions for professional exams. Complete the intermediate stages of your chosen qualification.
institutes: Big Four Firms (KPMG, EY, PwC, Deloitte) for training

title: Become a Chartered Accountant / Professional Member
description: Complete the final level exams and the practical training requirements of your professional body to earn the title of Chartered Accountant (CA), Chartered Global Management Accountant (CGMA), or ACCA member.

title: Senior Roles (Finance Manager / Controller)
description: With a few years of post-qualification experience, you can move into senior management roles, overseeing finance departments, managing budgets, and contributing to corporate strategy.
